ABOUT US

Since 1994 • Made in Canada • Serving North America

30+ Years of Craftsmanship

PlayerStall is a multigenerational family business laser-focused on building the highest quality custom wood sports lockers. We've partnered with collegiate powerhouses, pro organizations, and elite high schools to transform their locker rooms into culture hubs.

Get Free Consultation Explore Products

Our Story

For over three decades we've remained the trusted name in custom wood sports lockers. While others diversify, we double down on one craft—premium wood lockers that elevate every locker room they inhabit.

The PlayerStall difference comes from our relentless focus on quality, value, and service. We obsess over joinery, ventilation, electrical integration, and modular construction so that you get a locker that looks elite on day one and still turns heads fifteen seasons later.

We don’t produce metal, plastic, or generic storage. We build wood sports lockers—only wood—and we’ve perfected every cut, finish, and install detail to prove it.

30+ Years

Canadian Built. North America Proud.

Premium 3/4" birch • Modular repair • Pro-level finishing

What Sets PlayerStall Apart

30+ Years Experience

Trends fade. Craftsmanship lasts. We’ve delivered elite locker rooms through every generation of uniforms, cleats, and coaching staffs.

Family Business

Your project has our family name on it. That accountability shapes every conversation, CAD drawing, and delivery.

Made in Canada

100% manufactured on North American soil with responsibly sourced premium birch. No shortcuts, no mystery materials.

Exclusive Wood Focus

We’ve said no to metal so we can say yes to excellence. Specialization gives you deeper expertise, cleaner installs, and smarter solutions.

Lifetime Guarantee

Our modular design means we can service, repair, or replace individual components without touching the rest of your build.

Free Custom Design

Every engagement starts with a complimentary design consultation, locker room layout, and spec package tailored to your space.

How We Deliver

From Idea to Install in Five Steps

Our turnkey process removes friction so you can focus on culture, recruiting, and performance.

01

Free Consultation

We start with a detailed discovery covering roster size, equipment profile, branding goals, and timeline.

02

Custom Design

Our design studio delivers layouts, elevations, and specs dialed into your exact square footage and workflow.

03

Manufacturing

Every locker is precision-built in Canada with premium 3/4" birch, pro-grade hardware, and meticulous finishing.

04

Installation Support

We ship complete install packs, labeled components, and offer on-call support or on-site coordination for larger builds.

05

Lifetime Support

Need a replacement panel, extra grommets, or wire management upgrade? We’re here long after install day.

Lifetime Guarantee

We Don’t Stop Until You’re 100% Satisfied

Our modular approach allows us to service individual components—shelf, seat, face frame—without dismantling your entire locker.

What’s Covered

  • Construction defects
  • Material failures
  • Workmanship issues
  • Replacement part availability

Modular Advantage

Damaged component? We ship replacements cut to spec so your facilities team swaps parts in hours, not weeks.

Our Commitment

Three decades in, our promise is simple: if something isn’t right, we fix it fast. That’s how we earn repeat business and referrals.

Built for Decades

15+ year installs that still look day-one fresh.

1 (888) 58-STALL • info@customsportslockers.com

Why Wood Wins

Wood Lockers Outperform Metal

We’ve built with every material imaginable. Wood is the only one that delivers durability, prestige, and limitless customization.

Durability That Lasts

Properly sealed birch resists dents, rust, and fatigue. Metal can’t claim the same after six seasons of game day use.

Prestige & Culture

Wood turns a storage room into a recruiting asset. LED halos, nameplates, and finishes tie directly into your brand.

Natural Comfort

Warm surfaces, softer acoustics, and odor control give athletes a space they actually want to occupy.

Unlimited Customization

Integrate vents, USB/120V, helmet cradles, shoe drawers, and media tech without being confined to prefab metal molds.

Ready to build something legendary?

Walk away with a tailored locker room concept, pricing options across all five PlayerStall tiers, and a clear install plan.
